checks.title: Sensitive route rate limits
checks.summary: Required sensitive routes are rate limited.
evidence: Protected route registry entries: POST /api/v1/access/kiosk/auth, POST /api/v1/access/scan, POST /api/v1/access/scan-session, POST /api/v1/auth/login, POST /api/v1/auth/refresh

checks.title: PostgreSQL Row Level Security
checks.summary: RLS policies with FORCE enforcement were found in migrations.
evidence: Detected ENABLE/FORCE RLS and CREATE POLICY statements in Alembic migrations.

checks.title: Server-side validation
checks.summary: All inspected mutating routes use validated inputs.
evidence: Route inspection based on FastAPI dependency metadata.

checks.title: API keys and secrets
checks.summary: No obvious secret-handling issues were detected.
evidence: Static scan executed over tracked source files.

checks.title: Environment variables
checks.summary: Environment configuration is documented and looks valid.

checks.title: CORS restrictions
checks.summary: CORS policy is explicitly restricted for the current environment.

checks.title: Dependency audit reports
checks.summary: Dependency audit reports show no known vulnerabilities.
